Package org.raistlic.common.assertion

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Assertion<C,E extends Assertion<C,E>>
    Defines some generic useful assertions.
    AssertionFactory
    Export a collection of assertion instances for different types of candidates.
    BooleanAssertion
    Defines useful expectations on a Boolean candidate.
    CollectionAssertion<E>
    Defines useful expectations around Collection candidates.
    GenericAssertion<C>  
    NumberAssertion<N extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<N>>
    Defines a collection of useful checks around a wrapped Number candidate.
    PrimitiveBooleanAssertion  
    StringAssertion  
    ThreadAssertion
    Defines a collection of useful checks around a wrapped Thread candidate.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssertionFactoryManager  
    Assertions
    Static factory methods holder, the entry point of the package.
    GenericAssertionAbstract<C,E extends Assertion<C,E>>
    The class helps to check a specified candidate with certain expectations, and throws a custom runtime exception when the check fails.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AssertionFactory.Strategy
    The strategy of managing the expectation instances.
